column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: ROOT_BAN
column.comment: Level 1 -BAN in the associated BAN hierarchy. BAN ID of the tree root

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Billing Account Number

column.name: BILL_SEQ_NO
column.comment: Sequential invoice number in which the conversation or data transfer occurs.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: CYCLE_CODE
column.comment: Code of the BAN billing cycle.

column.name: CYCLE_RUN_YEAR
column.comment: Year of the invoice run

column.name: CYCLE_RUN_MONTH
column.comment: Month of the invoice run

column.name: CYCLE_CLOSE_DATE
column.comment: The end date of the billing period in which all calls made by the customer up to that point were settled.

column.name: CYCLE_FREQ
column.comment: Cycle duration. Valid Values are: 1 - monthly, 2 - bi-monthly, 3 - quarterly.

column.name: AFTER_CYCLE_CHG_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the bill is produced after cycle change. Valid Values: Y/ N

column.name: BILL_DATE
column.comment: Bill production date

column.name: PREV_BILL_DATE
column.comment: The previous bill production date.

column.name: BILL_DUE_DATE
column.comment: The payment due day of the bill.

column.name: BILL_CONF_STATUS
column.comment: Bill status indicator. Valid Values:   N - Not-Confirmed,  C - Confirmed,   U - Req-Undo,  A - After-Undo. DWH gets only confirmed datasets.

column.name: BILL_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the costumer will begin to be billed.

column.name: PRD_CVRG_STRT_DATE
column.comment: This is the actual start date of the billed period for the current bill. Regular bill: one day after the close date of the same cycle in the previous month (as defined in the table BILL_CYCLE_CONTROL). First bill: the date on which the customer was connected.

column.name: PRD_CVRG_END_DATE
column.comment: This is the actual end date of the billed period for the current bill. Regular bill: the cycle close date as defined in the table BILL_CYCLE_CONTROL. Expedited bill: the close date of the cycle that the bill was produced. Final bill: the date on which the customer was disconnected, which might be prior to the cycle close date or the billing run date.

column.name: BAN_STATUS
column.comment: Indicator BAN_STATUS

column.name: BAN_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: The run date of the last time the BAN status was updated.

column.name: PRODUCTION_DATE
column.comment: Bill date if the loaded table relates to a bill cycle

column.name: PRODUCTION_TYPE
column.comment: The production type of the specific bill (e.g., regular bill, first bill, final, revised final). Valid values: F - FINAL PRODUCTION, I - FIRST PRODUCTION, R - REGULAR PRODUCTION, S - SPECIAL PRODUCTION, V - REVISED FINAL PRODUCTION.

column.name: PRODUCTION_REQUEST
column.comment: The reason for the production of the specific bill. Valid values: C - In Cycle, E - Expedite.

column.name: EU_DEPOSIT_REQ_AMT
column.comment: The amount requested from the customer as a deposit during the billed period.

column.name: EU_PREV_BALANC_AMT
column.comment: The Billing Account's previous balance, i.e. the total amount due from the previous bill. It also can be the previous month's balance of a prepaid subscriber.

column.name: EU_PAST_DUE_AMT
column.comment: The total unpaid amount of the customer that was already due

column.name: EU_ACTUAL_BAL_AMT
column.comment: The actual balance amount. In regular bills, it contains the Total Due Amount. This amount may differ from the Total Due Amount in the following cases. a) The bill is produced for a company  worker  who does not actually pay the bill. The actual amount is

column.name: EU_TOTAL_DUE_AMT
column.comment: The calculated amount, in EURO,  that is to be paid, that is: Past Due Amount  + current (pending) charge amount  -  current (pending) credit amount.

column.name: EU_TOT_INVOICE_AMT
column.comment: Total charges and credits of current month, in EURO.

column.name: EU_INVOICE_VAT_AMT
column.comment: Total VAT of current month.

column.name: EU_PYM_RECEIVE_AMT
column.comment: The total amount of payments received since the previous bill, up to the current bill day. Note that payments may be applied up to the billing run date, regardless of the actual cycle close date.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_CHG
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities due to charges since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_VAT
column.comment: The value of tax amount associated with immediate charges, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BILLED_ADJ
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities, in EURO, due to adjustments since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance.

column.name: EU_CURR_CHARGE_AMT
column.comment: The value of all monetary activities due to charges since the previous bill which had an immediate effect on the balance, in EURO.

column.name: EU_CURR_CREDIT_AMT
column.comment: The total (unbilled) amount of credits accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This affects only the Total Amount Due. It does not affect the previous balance amount.

column.name: EU_TOT_IGN_IMM_CRG
column.comment: The total ignored billed (immediate) amount of charges accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO. This amount affects only  the Past  Due Balance.

column.name: EU_TOT_IGN_PEN_CRG
column.comment: The total ignored unbilled (pending) amount of charges accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle in EURO. This amount affects only  the Past  Due Balance.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_OC_AMT
column.comment: The total  OC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level OC charges and BAN level OC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_OC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the one-time charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_OTR_TOLL
column.comment: The total  TOLL charges amount in Euro for the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle except for TOLLILD. This amount includes all subscriber level TOLL charges and BAN level TOLL charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_ROAM
column.comment: The total  ROAMING charges amount for the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_SPCL_NUM
column.comment: The total  SPECIAL NUMBER charges amount for the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_FTR_AMT
column.comment: The total  FEATURE RELATED charges amount, in EURO,  for the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_RC_AMT
column.comment: The total  RC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level RC charges and BAN level RC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_RC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the recurring charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_UC_AMT
column.comment: The total  UC charges amount, in EURO, for  the whole BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. This amount includes all subscriber level UC charges and BAN level UC charges. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_UC_VAT
column.comment: The total VAT amount for the usage charges on BAN level, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_RC_UTC
column.comment: The total  RC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_UC_UTC
column.comment: The total  UC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_OC_UTC
column.comment: The total  OC UTC charges amount transferred from the subscriber during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_BAN_RCV_RC_UTC
column.comment: The total  RC UTC received charges of the BAN during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_BAN_RCV_UC_UTC
column.comment: The total  UC UTC received charges of the BAN during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_BAN_RCV_OC_UTC
column.comment: The total  OC UTC received charges of the BAN during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_TREE_DISC
column.comment: The total  tree bundling discount amount to the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_SUBS_DISC
column.comment: The total  tree bundling discount amount to the subscriber accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_BAN_LVL_DISC
column.comment: The total  BAN level discount during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_HIER_DISC
column.comment: The total  HIERARCHICAL discount (Sub Tree BAN Discount) during the current bill cycle, in EURO.

column.name: NUM_OF_ATTEMPT_CALLS
column.comment: The number of attempt calls for all subscribers types. For roaming calls and calls initiated in the D2-network.

column.name: NUM_OF_ROAMING_CALLS
column.comment: The  number of roaming calls for all subscribers types. (attempted and successful call)

column.name: DURATION
column.comment: The total number of minutes.

column.name: EU_VAT_AMT
column.comment: The value of tax amount associated with immediate charges, in EURO.

column.name: VAT_EXMP_IND
column.comment: Tax exemption indicator

column.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_NO
column.comment: The customer's bank account number

column.name: BANK_CODE
column.comment: This identifies the customer's bank.

column.name: BANK_NAME
column.comment: The bank name as defined in banks table.

column.name: CREDIT_CARD_NO
column.comment: Contains the customer's credit card number for the regular monthly bill payment.

column.name: CREDIT_CARD_TYPE
column.comment: The type of the credit card.

column.name: CR_CARD_AUTH_CODE
column.comment: The code issued as an authorisation that the credit card is valid.

column.name: CR_CARD_EXP_DATE
column.comment: The credit card expiration date.

column.name: MANUAL_HNDL_REASON
column.comment: The reason if the bill is held up for inspection by a company billing clerk.

column.name: MANUAL_HNDL_REQ_OPID
column.comment: The user ID of the cellular company employee who requested that the bill is to be inspected.

column.name: MANUAL_HNDL_BY_OPID
column.comment: The user ID of the cellular company employee who inspects the bill.

column.name: CARRY_OVER_IND
column.comment: Indicates whether the balance of this bill may be added to the next bill without an additional charge for late payment. Carry over is usually applied when the amount to be paid is less than the minimum payable amount according to the market policy. Valid

column.name: NUM_OF_CTNS
column.comment: The actual number of subscribers reported in the current bill. Note that Disconnected, Suspended, and Cancelled subscribers are also counted here if they were active throughout the billed period or any charge or adjustment for them was included in the bil

column.name: PAYMENT_METHOD
column.comment: The payment method of the BAN. Valid values: "DD" - direct debit, "CA" - cash, "CC" - credit card, "MT" - money transfer.

column.name: PAYMENT_SUB_METHOD
column.comment: The payment sub method of the BAN.

column.name: BILL_DELIVERY_IND
column.comment: Indicates to where the bill was delivered (customer/archive/both): According to the bill_delivery_ind value bill production will know how to deal with the bill.

column.name: BILL_HIST_IND
column.comment: A special indicator for Bill History maintenance that indicates whether the record should stay in the bill table or move to the Bill History table. Valid values: "B" - Stay in Bill, "H" - History Bill.

column.name: INVOICE_SEQ_NO
column.comment: The sequence number of the invoice item to which this activity is related.

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: NO_OF_CAR_OVR_BILLS
column.comment: The number of carry-over bills.

column.name: PREV_CARR_OVER_IND
column.comment: Carry-over indicator in previous bill run.

column.name: EU_TOT_DUE_ON_BILL
column.comment: The total amount due to display on the Bill.

column.name: EU_PREV_DCC_BALANCE
column.comment: Previous DCC Balance

column.name: EU_TOT_BAN_ATTEMPT
column.comment: The total  ATTEMPT charges amount, in EURO, for the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: EU_TOT_DISPUT_AMT
column.comment: The Total DISPUTE amount for that BILL, in EURO.

column.name: EU_TOT_MP_AMT
column.comment: The total MobilePayment charges amount for the BAN accumulated for the bill during the current bill cycle. The amount is after UTC and DISCOUNTS.

column.name: BIC
column.comment: Bank Identifier Code

column.name: IBAN
column.comment: International Bank Account Number

column.name: CUSTOMER_BIC
column.comment: Customer’s BIC for which the Direct-Debit will be requested

column.name: CUSTOMER_IBAN
column.comment: Field will contain the IBAN of the customer

column.name: UMR_ID
column.comment: Contains the unique mandate reference number for the customer - Contains the unique mandate reference number for the customer

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
